hive

Class GoSearching

  • java.lang.Object
    • hive.GoSearching
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GoSearching
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The class sets most of the actions of the bees. Watch out for endless structure.
    Author:
    ole

      private void arrived()
      Bee has knowledge and arrived at source -> Get food

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method, go to switcher
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • switcher

        private void switcher()
        When status of bee is changed, we should always get back here. Depending on the status field of the bee, the next method to be run is chosen.

      • arrived

        Bee has knowledge and arrived at source -> Get food

         int destY,
         java.lang.String destination)
        Flying to a destination
        Parameters:
        destX - destination x-point
        destY - destination y-point
        destination - destination type {"home", "getFood",...}
        Returns:
        bee object, probably not needed (?)

      • dance

        private void dance()
        bien is at home and gives other bees information about trach better quality -> longer dance bigger size of tracht -> longer dance less food in beehive -> longer dance (not implemented) far away -> shorter dance

      • starting

        private void starting()
        Bee is at home, but has information about source and wants to get the food.
